name: SUPER HOT for the Game Boy
name_original: SUPER HOT for the Game Boy
description:
SUPERHOT for the Game Boy is a project for "Retro Jam" 2021.

CONTROLS:  WASD = up, left, down and right.  T = the A button and F = the B button

Its a spin on the super-hot franchise but for the original game boy, featuring the Infomus super-hot time mechanic with the game boy colour scheme and controls fitted into the game boy resolution for added aesthetic. 

(5 levels)

(Did not use the "Side-effects" theme)
